name: Bacon Wrapped Tater Tots
author: jakeandbarb
summary: This is a simple appetizer that is great for breakfast or brunch we make them every year for Christmas morning brunch.
ingredients: 2 pounds sliced bacon, cut in half
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange the tater tots in a single layer on a large baking sheet
Bake for about 10 minutes, so that they are no longer frozen but not completely cooked
Remove from the oven and allow to cool
Place bacon slices in a skillet over medium heat
Fry bacon until cooked through but still flexible
Break each slice of cheese into small pieces
Each slice should make about 16 pieces
Place a piece of cheese against the side of a tater tot
Wrap with a piece of the bacon and secure with a toothpick
Repeat until you run out of tots
Bake for about 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bacon is crisp
